description: Grafana Dashboard for Veeam Backup for Microsoft Office 365 Dashboard

targets.query: SELECT last("uptime_latest") FROM "vsphere_host_sys" WHERE ("esxhostname" =~ /^$esxi$/ AND "vcenter" =~ /^$vcenter$/ AND "clustername" =~ /^$clustername$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT last("uptime_latest") FROM "vsphere_host_sys" WHERE ("esxhostname" =~ /^$esxi$/ AND "vcenter" =~ /^$vcenter$/ AND "clustername" =~ /^$clustername$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("threadsNumber") FROM "veeam_office365_proxies" WHERE ("proxies" =~ /^$proxies$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

SELECT last("uptime_latest") FROM "vsphere_host_sys" WHERE ("esxhostname" =~ /^$esxi$/ AND "vcenter" =~ /^$vcenter$/ AND "clustername" =~ /^$clustername$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT last("uptime_latest") FROM "vsphere_host_sys" WHERE ("esxhostname" =~ /^$esxi$/ AND "vcenter" =~ /^$vcenter$/ AND "clustername" =~ /^$clustername$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT last("uptime_latest") FROM "vsphere_host_sys" WHERE ("esxhostname" =~ /^$esxi$/ AND "vcenter" =~ /^$vcenter$/ AND "clustername" =~ /^$clustername$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT last("uptime_latest") FROM "vsphere_host_sys" WHERE ("esxhostname" =~ /^$esxi$/ AND "vcenter" =~ /^$vcenter$/ AND "clustername" =~ /^$clustername$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("usage_average") FROM "vsphere_host_cpu" WHERE "esxhostname" = ($esxi) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(none)

panels.description:
This Panel includes the Backup Repositories.
When using Object Storage, it will appear on the right column with the prefix called OBJECT.

targets.query: SELECT  (mean("capacity") - mean("freeSpace"))  FROM  "veeam_office365_repository" WHERE ("repository" =~ /^$repository$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m), "repository"
SELECT mean("usedSpaceGB") FROM "veeam_office365_objectstorage" WHERE ("objectname" =~ /^$objectstorage$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "objectname" fill(none)

panels.title: Datastores - Usage Capacity

targets.query: SELECT last("usedSpaceGB") FROM "veeam_office365_objectstorage" WHERE ("objectname" =~ /^$objectstorage$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "objectname" fill(none)

SELECT  (mean("capacity") - mean("freeSpace")) * (100 / mean("capacity"))  FROM  "veeam_office365_repository" WHERE ("repository" =~ /^$repository$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
